content: I hope we get along well.

content: {A开心}I, Bhadra, have arrived on your Planet! Thanks for the invite, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, just what I'd expect from you! {A沉醉闻}Seems there's lots of good stuff around here... mm-hmm, bhan!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1012巴彦_巴彦

content:
Alright, bhan!
Pack up, we're heading out — right meow!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1012巴彦_巴彦

content: Thanks for the warm welcome! I, Bhadra, will try my best to hold back— From mining everything around here to bits! <style=SizeSmall>Alright bhan, first meal in the my home's gonna be meat stew!</style>
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1012巴彦_巴彦

content:
And now,
Let's hear it from our planet's neighbors,
As we welcome our new resident—
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1012巴彦_巴彦

content: Everything's ready. Welcome to your new home!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1012巴彦_巴彦

content:
Hoho! Thanks a bunch for all your speeches!
Here's to our new neighbor's smooth sailing ahead!
And with that, our welcome party's wrapped up purr-fectly!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1012巴彦_巴彦

content: The place is ready. Time to give <style=NpcName>Bhadra</style> a call and invite him to move in!

content: Your place is all set up, can't wait to see ya!
